title: Bank Frick Adapter
description: Adapter for fetching account information from Bank Frick

API_ENDPOINT.description: The URL for the Bank Frick API.

API_KEY.description: API key to use. Must be generated in the Bank Frick UI using the PRIVATE_KEY below.

PRIVATE_KEY.description: RSA key used to produce and verify signatures when authorizing the client.

PAGE_SIZE.description: The number of accounts to fetch per call to /accounts. Must be >= 1 and <= 500.
